name: John's Adventure Chapter 1
description:
In a alternative universe were mythical monsters exist.  A young boy named Johnstarted his adventure in a small little village named Porto Rafth.  

Participate in John's life and help him on his adventure.


Credits to the team:

  • Marios Papazogloy ( Programming )
  • Theophile Aumont  ( Programming )
  • Manos Danezis ( Story Designer )
  • Thanos Pallis ( Music Designed )

Details of the Project

  • Python 3.10
  • Pygame 2.1.0 (2.1.3dev4 for Mac)

Please avoid speaking about story's plot especially now its on a early stage, comments will be removed with no warning.
